layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x106
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x106
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x90
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 600x90 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 598x88
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 598x84
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 296x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 292x79
                text run at (2,2) width 292: "Cell text should be justified which means that"
                text run at (2,22) width 89: "the right and "
                text run at (91,22) width 203: "left margins should line up, no"
                text run at (2,42) width 246: "matter how long the content becomes "
                text run at (248,42) width 46: "(except"
                text run at (2,62) width 262: "the last line which should be left aligned)."
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (300,2) size 296x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 292x79
                text run at (2,2) width 292: "Cell text should be justified which means that"
                text run at (2,22) width 89: "the right and "
                text run at (91,22) width 203: "left margins should line up, no"
                text run at (2,42) width 246: "matter how long the content becomes "
                text run at (248,42) width 46: "(except"
                text run at (2,62) width 262: "the last line which should be left aligned)."
